summary:
Now I am acquiring and developing new skills as a project manager in the IT and gamedev industry.

My background in organizing and coordinating tourist programs is perfectly projected into my current activity.
My dedication for detail, to clarity in all actions, and my ability to reveal and notice different features and nuances help me to do my work with passion and pleasure. The longer I keep the whole puzzle in my head, building new variations, the more interesting is the plot and the greater the involvement is.
The new professional status only warms up my inspiration and genuine interest.

Feel free to connect with me here or send me a message by email

profile_positions.description:
Create mobile games, full cycle of game development on Unity, develop entertainment apps and web servises for business

Mobile Rockets build mobile apps that guarantee to improve your business communication, engage your audience and grow your business. 
Our mobile app service gives your business the tools it needs to reach and engage your audience or customers.

• Overseeing Company's outsourced projects
• Creation of proposal requests, establishing project budgets, and reviewing proporsals submitted to the Company
• Organization and optimization of business processes in outsourcing
• Focus on results and successful collobaration with Partners
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
One of the main specializations of our company is organization of cultural programs for representatives of the artistic and musical elite from Spain. As part of cooperation with the largest museums in this country, excursion programs have been successfully implemented for private collectors, as well as sponsors, co-founders and friends of such museums as the Prado, the Reina Sofia Art Center in Madrid, the Museum Thyssen-Bornemisza, the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, the Museum of Modern Art in Barcelona.

• Providing cultural leisure within the framework of a business visit to Moscow for diplomats, official delegations, representatives of the directorate and top managers of the largest companies in Spain, Central and South America.
• The company is a permanent partner of the Spanish Embassy in Moscow and the General Consulates of Spain in Moscow and St. Petersburg
profile_positions.title: Head Of Operations

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities  
• MICE, leisure groups and FIT booking and full coordination: transport and logistics, accommodation, train/plane tickets booking, entrance tickets to museums and theatres purchase, selection of menu and restaurants or venues. Gala dinners organization.
• Aware of the details of cooperation with passengers’ port of St. Petersburg (“Morskoy Fasad”) and Moscow Kremlin Museums.
profile_positions.title: Senior Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for signing or prolongation of contracts with 4-5* hotels
• Contracts and other documentation exchange with all the main museums
• Work with transport companies
• Work with guides
• Service and coordination of incoming travelling groups
• Responsible for realization of the program on every step 
• Budget monitoring and control over incoming invoices
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager
